title: Penalties for violations
context: ยง378-65 Penalties for violations. (a) A person or public employer who violates this part shall be fined not less than $500 nor more than $5,000 for each violation. (b) A civil fine which is ordered pursuant to this part shall be deposited with the director of finance to the credit of the general fund of the State. [L 1987, c 267, pt of ยง1; am L 2002, c 56, ยง4; am L 2011, c 166, ยง7]
